statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name, network_speed FROM network_performance_data ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, packet_loss_rate FROM network_performance_data WHERE network_speed > 100 ORDER BY packet_loss_rate ASC;
SELECT device_id, latency FROM network_performance_data WHERE latency < 20;
SELECT device_name, network_speed, packet_loss_rate FROM network_performance_data WHERE device_name LIKE 'Device%' ORDER BY packet_loss_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_data ORDER BY device_name DESC, network_speed ASC, latency DESC, packet_loss_rate ASC;
SELECT device_name, network_speed FROM network_performance_data WHERE network_speed > 1000 ORDER BY network_speed DESC;
SELECT device_name, latency FROM network_performance_data WHERE packet_loss_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY latency ASC;
SELECT device_name, network_speed, packet_loss_rate FROM network_performance_data WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices, AVG(latency) AS average_latency FROM network_performance_data WHERE network_speed < 5000 AND packet_loss_rate < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT device_name, install_date FROM network_devices ORDER BY install_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Data Center%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location='Data Center A';
SELECT device_type, AVG(cpu_utilization) AS avg_cpu_utilization FROM network_devices JOIN performance_data ON network_devices.device_id = performance_data.device_id GROUP BY device_type;

SELECT device_name, AVG(memory_utilization) AS avg_memory_utilization FROM network_devices JOIN performance_data ON network_devices.device_id = performance_data.device_id WHERE memory_utilization > 50 GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, install_date FROM network_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM performance_data WHERE network_traffic > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC) LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location='Server Room';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE id=3;
SELECT device_name, timestamp FROM network_devices WHERE last_modified >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location='Data Center';
SELECT device_name, ip_address, last_modified FROM network_devices WHERE location='Office' AND last_modified > '2021-01-01';
SELECT nd.device_name, pm.metric_name, pm.metric_value FROM network_devices nd JOIN performance_metrics pm ON nd.id = pm.device_id WHERE pm.metric_value > 50;
SELECT bd.bottleneck_description, nd.device_name, bd.timestamp FROM bottlenecks bd JOIN network_devices nd ON bd.device_id = nd.id;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE location='New York';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT device_id, MAX(memory_usage) AS max_memory_usage FROM performance_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE cpu_usage > 80 AND memory_usage > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center A' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, issue_description FROM bottlenecks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-01';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_update FROM network_devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, last_update FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE '%room';
SELECT device_id, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center' AND device_type = 'switch';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_update FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_type, last_update DESC;

SELECT device_name, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization FROM network_devices JOIN device_performance ON network_devices.device_id = device_performance.device_id WHERE cpu_utilization > 80 AND memory_utilization > 70;
SELECT device_name, data_size FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT device_name, error_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_errors ON network_devices.device_id = network_errors.device_id WHERE error_message LIKE '%critical%';
